title: Labour peer who joked about a transgender campaign and sexually harassed women has been ordered to undergo 'behavioural coaching'
text:
A Labour peer who joked about a transgender campaign and sexually harassed women has been ordered to undergo "behavioural coaching".

Lord Stone, 77, who was found to have caused harassment on four occasions in Parliament after being investigated by a Lords standards committee, has had the Labour whip suspended as a result of the findings.

In April he was accused of stopping a woman in a stairwell while they were alone and telling her she looked beautiful with her hair worn differently from her usual style.
